meanings: (논삶기) harrowing tilled soil 삶이하다 harrow tilled soil
(볍씨 뿌리기) direct planting of rice seed on a harrowed paddy, 삶이하다 plant rice seed directly on a harrowed paddy

vlive.korean: 저는 이 삶이 너무 좋아요. I'm very satisfied with my life now. 듣기 View video NU'EST : NU'EST V time : 뉴이스트 보이는라디오 L.O.Λ.E STORY 시즌2 4화

vlive.korean: 나는 원래 그런 삶이었어! My life was like that! 듣기 View video SF9 : 찬희휘영
